manifest.author: nightx24
manifest.changelog:
* Removed unnecessary flags

* Enabled Royalty-Free Music tab

* Updated UI elements for a fresh look

* Enabled Reels tab under location

* Replaced Twinbox bottom layout with a top filter layout (due to issues with the bottom layout)

* Enabled coin flip animation on profile picture

* Redesigned several icons

* Added ability to watch Reels while viewing comments

* Improved overall config stability

If you encounter any bugs, feel free to report them!
manifest.name: Night-X's Backup
